Posts.EditableText: Having recently discovered a bug in one of my games, I corrected it and uploaded the amended version. I realise, of course, that the players who have already downloaded the earlier version will continue with the old version unless they re-download. My question is, will those already playing on-line pick up on the new version when they reload their “saves” or will only new players benefit from the corrected version?

Posts.EditableText: Saved games store the entire game state - pretty much a complete copy of the game file (except for any graphics and sounds). So unfortunately any bugs will remain in the saved versions.
